title: Herbed breadcrumb vegetarian stuffing
ingredients: ['40g butter', '4 onions, chopped', '3 sticks celery, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '170g fresh breadcrumbs', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh sage', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh rosemary', '1 sprig thyme', '1/2 teaspoon dried oregano', '150ml vegetable stock, or as needed', 'salt and pepper']
